name: BorgWarner Inc.
goal: BorgWarner Inc. (NYSE: BWA) is a global product leader in clean and efficient technology solutions for combustion, hybrid and electric vehicles. With manufacturing and technical facilities in 64 locations in 17 countries, the company employs approximately 30,000 worldwide. For more information, please visit borgwarner.com.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Transportation - Automotive propulsion, improving fuel economy and reducing emissions for combustion, hybrid and electric vehicle applications
Energy - Energy efficiency, renewable energy, future transportation propulsion
Technology - Innovation & technology neutral regulations based on real world performance for fuel efficiency, CO2 and criteria emissions
Manufacturing
Free trade
Logistics
Health Care
Corporate Governance
Tax
